headline: Halliburton Company (HAL)’s Having A Hard Time, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Mind As He Discussed A “Weird Number”. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is a mega oil and gas production equipment provider. The shares have lost 18% year-to-date, as, like its peer Schlumberger, the firm has yet to […]

headline: NOV Q2 Earnings Miss, Revenues Beat Estimates, Both Decrease Y/Y
summary: NOV expects a 1-3% decrease in consolidated revenues year over year for third-quarter 2025, with adjusted EBITDA anticipated to range from $230-$250 million.
